text: The Reform Party of the United States of America (RPUSA), generally known as the Reform Party USA or the Reform Party, is a political party in the United States, founded in 1995 by Ross Perot. It can be seen as a third party to the Republican and Democratic parties. The party had nominated several notable candidates over the years, such as founder Ross Perot, Pat Buchanan, and Ralph Nader.http://www.reformparty.org The party's most significant victory came when Jesse Ventura was elected governor of Minnesota in 1998. == Best Results in Major Races == Office Percent District Year Candidate President 14.19% Maine 1996 Ross Perot 13.56% Montana 1996 12.71% Idaho 1996 US Senate 15.42% Mississippi 2002 Shawn O'Hara 8.37% Kansas 2002 George Cook 6.98% Minnesota 1996 Dean Barkley US House 33.70% Florida District 5 1998 Jack Gargan 21.09% California District 21 1998 John Evans 20.99% Mississippi District 1 2004 Barbara Dale Washer Governor 36.99% Minnesota 1998 Jesse Ventura 15.33% Kentucky 1999 Gatewood Galbraith 2.08% New Hampshire 1996 Fred Bramante ==References== Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:Political parties in the United States
title: Reform Party of the United States of America
